model.name: MySQL_OCP
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE vehicles_flow ( period integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`period`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "date" string(10) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), "day" string(15) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`day`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), "hour" string(8) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`hour`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), hourend string(8) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`hourend`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), station string(3) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`station`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), vehicletype string(8) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`vehicletype`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), paymenttype string(15) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`paymenttype`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), amount integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`amount`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Transport`.`vehicles_flow`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: PostgreSQL_OCP
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE readings ( readingdate timestamp OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"readingdate"', NATIVE_TYPE 'timestamp', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), temp double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"temp"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float8', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), station integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"station"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int4', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), wind double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"wind"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float8', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), pressure double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"pressure"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float8', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), rain double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"rain"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float8', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), uvindex double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"uvindex"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float8', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"public"."readings"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: Mongo
SQLServer_OCP
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE MeteorologyInfo ( "Date" string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Date"', NATIVE_TYPE 'nvarchar', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "Hour" string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Hour"', NATIVE_TYPE 'nvarchar', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), Station integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Station"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), Wind float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Wind"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), WindDirection float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"WindDirection"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), TEMP_C float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"TEMP_C"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), HR_PORC float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"HR_PORC"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRESS_MBAR float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PRESS_MBAR"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PLUV_MM float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PLUV_MM"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), RAD_SOL float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"RAD_SOL"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), UV_UVINDEX float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UV_UVINDEX"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MeteorologyDB"."dbo"."MeteorologyInfo"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE', CARDINALITY '60');

model.name: Vista1
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW MeteorologyInfo ( "Date" string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Date"', NATIVE_TYPE 'nvarchar', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "Hour" string(2147483647) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Hour"', NATIVE_TYPE 'nvarchar', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), Station integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Station"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), Wind float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Wind"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), WindDirection float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"WindDirection"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), TEMP_C float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"TEMP_C"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), HR_PORC float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"HR_PORC"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PRESS_MBAR float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PRESS_MBAR"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), PLUV_MM float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PLUV_MM"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), RAD_SOL float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"RAD_SOL"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), UV_UVINDEX float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"UV_UVINDEX"', NATIVE_TYPE 'float', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"MeteorologyDB"."dbo"."MeteorologyInfo"', CARDINALITY '60') AS SELECT * FROM SQLServer_OCP.MeteorologyInfo;
